select oi.id, oi.code, oi.room_code, oi.start_date, oi.end_date, oi.rent_day, oi.days, oi.total_price, oi.user_id, oi.create_date, oi.del_flag, oi.order_status, oi.recede_flag, ri.name, rt.type_name, rt.images, ui.name as userName, ui.id_card from order_info oi left join room_info ri on (ri.code = oi.room_code) left join room_type rt on (rt.id = ri.`type`) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oe.user_id) where 1 = 1 and del_flag = '0'
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')
AND oi.order_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.orderStatus},'%')
AND ri.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.name},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
order by oi.create_date desc
